I am a second-year PhD candidate in Artificial Intelligence seeking an industry research internship. My work focuses on applying AI to high-stakes, human-in-the-loop domains such as energy, security, and defence. In these critical settings, I strive to build AI systems that are robust, reliable, and transparently audited by humans, ensuring accountability, ethical alignment, and strategic value.
